title: Court of Justice
extract: 1. court of justice - a tribunal that is presided over by a magistrate or by one or more judges who administer justice according to the laws. court of law, lawcourt, court. court, judicature, tribunal - an assembly (including one or more judges) to conduct judicial business.
extract_html: 1. court of justice - a tribunal that is presided over by a magistrate or by one or more judges who administer justice according to the laws. court of law, lawcourt, court. court, judicature, tribunal - an assembly (including one or more judges) to conduct judicial business.
